snippet.title: NEW | SingStar Ultimate Party Launch Trailer | Exclusive to PlayStation
snippet.description: No mics? No problem. Turn your smartphone into a pocket-sized mic and sing your favourite songs to entertain (or in some cases disturb) your mates. With the free SingStar™ app not only will your personal microphone be at hand for any harmonising emergencies, but you'll also be able to mix up your personal playlist and queue up the latest hits.
